description: all the necessary ingredients laying on a kitchen counter

content: "Give all the ingredients needed and their respective quantities before starting the cooking steps."

description: Close-up of beef tenderloin steaks being seasoned with salt

content: "Season the beef tenderloin steaks generously with salt on both sides."

description: Black peppercorns being crushed and steaks pressed into them

content: "Crush black peppercorns and press the steaks into them for even coating."

description: Skillet with steaks being seared in butter

content: "Sear the steaks in a hot skillet with melted butter for 4-5 minutes on each side."

description: Flambe process with Cognac in a skillet

content: "Carefully flambe the steaks with Cognac in the skillet."

description: Heavy cream being stirred into the skillet sauce

content: "Stir in heavy cream and let the sauce simmer until slightly thickened."

description: Steaks being coated with creamy peppercorn sauce

content: "Coat the steaks with the creamy peppercorn sauce in the skillet."

description: Plated Steak Au Poivre with side dishes

content: "Serve the Steak Au Poivre hot with your favorite sides. Enjoy this delicious and flavorful meal!"
